snippet: A man who once said he wanted to wage jihad against the United States renounced terrorism on Friday as he was sentenced to 25 years in prison in a bombing plot.
abstract: Antonio Martinez renounces terrorism as he is sentenced to 25 years in prison for plotting to bomb a military recruiting center near Baltimore in December 2010.
lead_paragraph: A man who once said he wanted to wage jihad against the United States renounced terrorism on Friday as he was sentenced to 25 years in prison in a bombing plot.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
